name: All Root Beer Popsicles®
author: brilyint1
summary: Because of the extra sugar these do not freeze up rock solid. Their taste and texture is like the store-bought. You can get the same results with cream soda and it's delish. Teenager approved, by the way.
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon root beer flavoring (such as Zatarains® Root Beer Extract)
directions: Pour root beer into a wide pot
Bring to a boil; reduce heat to low
Simmer until reduced by 1/3, 15 to 20 minutes
Remove from heat; cool completely, about 30 minutes
Stir root beer flavoring into mixture
Pour root beer mixture into ice pop molds; freeze until firm, about 1 hour and 30 minutes
